answerText: Ariana Grande-Butera[10] Ariana Grande collaborated with this Australian rapper on her song "Problem." She "can't stand no haters" and "can't shop at no department" in her number one hit "Fancy."
heading: ICCS |2014 | 1 | 5 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: Big Sean is featured on this artist's song "Best Mistake" from her 2014 album My Everything.  [10] Name this American singer who "got a bad boy, I must admit it" in her 2013 hit song "The Way."
